page.title: 11LEISURE ,FARNBOROUGH
page.content:
We found out what local people do in their spare time.
This is what we found out- {24}people have a special interest which they do in their spare time. {8}people had to travel far to do their hobby. {4}people thought that their hobby was extraordinary. {17}people said that their hobby was expensive. Out of the{women}the most popular hobbies were{gardening}and{active sports. Out of the{men}the most popular hobby was{active sports. I think that the strangest hobby is that Mrs Kenny and Mrs Napier,two members of Mayfield School staff,both go windsurfing!
